Name: Colonel Mustard
Description: Born 2954. Founder and commander of the former Mustard's Beans mercenary regiment.
ReputationStatements: Killing the 'Wraith' will be tough but that will also depend on you, Commander. Good luck, sir.

MissionSuccessStatements: Commander, excellent work in defeating the Kerensky's Ghost. Well done indeed.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Well, perhaps next time we shall be more successful.
BadFaithFailureStatements: I fear it will not be yet that I shall see such a legend, Commander.
